A Bit About Us

We are currently seeking a dynamic and self-motivated Consulting Senior DevOps Engineer to join our fast-paced technology firm. This role will be an integral part of our team, working to design, implement, and manage robust, scalable, and highly available systems. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in DevOps, with a particular emphasis on Azure, Kubernetes, Python, high availability, high scalability, security, and MLOps. This is a fantastic opportunity for someone looking to take their career to the next level while working on exciting and innovative projects.



Why join us?


 Conversion to full-time at 6 months Highly visible project within +$40B company 100% Remote Role

Job Details

We are currently seeking a dynamic and self-motivated Consulting Senior DevOps Engineer to join our fast-paced technology firm. This role will be an integral part of our team, working to design, implement, and manage robust, scalable, and highly available systems. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in DevOps, with a particular emphasis on Azure, Kubernetes, Python, high availability, high scalability, security, and MLOps. This is a fantastic opportunity for someone looking to take their career to the next level while working on exciting and innovative projects.

Responsibilities

 Design, implement, and manage continuous delivery systems and methodologies on Azure. Develop and maintain scalable, robust systems with high availability and reliability. Work closely with developers to ensure that development follows established processes and works as intended. Leverage Kubernetes for the orchestration of Docker containers in a clustered environment. Utilize Python scripting for automation tasks and improving workflow efficiency. Establish and maintain security, backup, and redundancy strategies. Participate in the design and implementation of the infrastructure to support MLOps. Troubleshoot and resolve issues in dev, test, and production environments. Develop and maintain DevOps best practices and conduct training sessions for the team. Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to understand project objectives, gather automation requirements, design automated tests, troubleshoot issues, and implement scalable solutions.

Qualifications

 Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Minimum of 3 years of experience in a DevOps role. Strong experience with Azure, Kubernetes, Python, high availability, high scalability, and security. Experience with MLOps is highly desirable. Strong understanding of DevOps principles and infrastructure as code. Familiarity with continuous integration, continuous deployment, and source control systems. Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Strong communication skills, with the ability to communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Ability to work in a fast-paced, agile environment, managing multiple priorities. Strong team player with a commitment to continuous learning and improvement.

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button.
